dc_description_s: This point dataset represents the locations of all landfills in the United States. This layer is part of a collection of GIS data for renewable and electric energy in the U.S. This layer is from the 2014 Fall Quarter update (Update 1017).This shapefile can be used to locate and analyze existing landfill sites in the United States.
